timeline.message:
Merge of dazavala 11851-tbitonti_jms20_fat_delay
Fixes to DelayFullTest.
Also:
A few small cleanups.
Changed to run only the Jakarta/EE9 repeat.
Re-added full mode annotations as previously present.
Added comments in select places for unresolved questions regarding the tests.

timeline.bodyText: We can pull these // dz comments.  I added them to debug whether the containing test methods failed due to unexpected client|server state and configuration.  This is a poorly designed test case which relies on the order of test execution, and where tests like this one do not verify (assert) the state and configuration of the messaging client and servers are running before verifying the use-case behavior.
timeline.author: dazavala

timeline.bodyText: I'll remove this in another branch which repairs the lacking doPriv in the messaging runtime.
timeline.author: dazavala

replies.bodyText: Noted.  I added to the comment that this would be fixed in a subsequent update.
replies.author: tbitonti

timeline.bodyText: Remove '// TODO: ???`  My concern here is that the test methods from this point forward changed pattern for computing testResult.  Odd.
timeline.author: dazavala

timeline.bodyText: I'll fix this in another branch, as mentioned earlier, as I need to determine whether my intended changes to the messaging runtime are appropriate.
timeline.author: dazavala

replies.bodyText: Noted; I added a comment to this effect.
replies.author: tbitonti

timeline.message:
Corrected comments to remove reference to commercial liberty.
Removed comments out test code.
Corrected transform rules per review comments.

Initial port of JMS20 delivery delay FAT tests from commercial liberty.
All files are present and converted.  Compilation is complete.
Tests which modify feature sets must be updated to run under jakarta conversion.
No tests have yet been run.
Corrections to delivery delay FAT tests; all running except transacted send, and still need to update the test which dynamically updates features.

Use FATRunner for test classes.
DelayFullSecOnTest is running fully.

Put jmsmdb EJBJAR back under jmsapp, and back in the apps folder.
Add transform step for MDB server configurations, which have activation specifications.
Correct the tests which update configured features to use the correct features when running in the jakarta repeat.
Misc code fixes.

Enable delivery delay FAT suite and set to run only on the Jakarta repeat.
These test classes are enabled:
  DelayLiteSecOffTest
  DelayLiteSecOnTest
  DelayFullSecOffTest
  DelayFullSecOnTest
This test class is seeing failures on TCP tests and is disabled:
  DelayFullTest

Merge of dazavala 11851-tbitonti_jms20_fat_delay
Fixes to DelayFullTest.
Also:
A few small cleanups.
Changed to run only the Jakarta/EE9 repeat.
Re-added full mode annotations as previously present.
Added comments in select places for unresolved questions regarding the tests.

Corrected comments to remove reference to commercial liberty.
Removed comments out test code.
Corrected transform rules per review comments.

Corrected comments to remove reference to commercial liberty.
Removed comments out test code.
Corrected transform rules per review comments.
Correct transformer master XML rules for messaging delay FAT.
